* SQL injection: This is a type of vulnerability that occurs when an attacker is able to inject malicious code into a website's database.
* Cross-site scripting (XSS): This is a type of vulnerability that occurs when an attacker is able to inject malicious code into a website's code.
* Cross-site request forgery (CSRF): This is a type of vulnerability that occurs when an attacker is able to trick a user into performing an action on a website without their knowledge or consent.
